main_definition: Mere is an adjective used to describe something as being simple, small in significance or importance.

meanings_and_examples.example: She had only a mere handful of coins left.
His opinion on the matter was simply a mere whisper compared to her loud voice.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Merely or only in reference to emphasize simplicity
meanings_and_examples.example: Mere mortals cannot alter destiny, but their actions can shape it.
